content:
The Eliyahu Menachem Langsam Family


Eliyahu (Eli) Menachem Langsam was married to Dvora and had two known children.

  • Morris (Avrum Moshe) (1874 - October 31, 1931) married Rose/Reizel (1880 - December 16, 1951), daughter of Joseph Ze'ev, and had three known children. Morris was from Sienawa, Poland and Rose was from Lajon. The family plot is at Mount Hebron, Flushing, NY-Eitz Chaim Lodge; Block 2.
    • Lillian (Lieba) (October 12, 1902 - February 22, 1992) married Mayer Socher and had one daughter.
      Dvora
    • Sidney (Shlomo Zalman) (December 15, 1905 - October 05, 1945) was layed to rest at Mount Hebron, in Flushing. His wife may be Mollie/Malka.
    • Michael (Elimelech) was last known to be living in Miami Beach, FL.
  • Anna (Emmie) married Abraham Koenigsberg and had two known children.
    • Max
    • Samuel


I would be very interested to hear from anyone with knowledge or an interest in the Miller family.

Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com

My home address is
           1374 East 28th Street
           Brooklyn NY 11210-5311
           USA

Last updated 7/18/02
